DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to test how ketoconazole affects with handling of vinflunine by the body which might affect how much vinflunine is in the blood stream and for how long
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Ketoconazole on the Pharmacokinetics of Vinflunine
DOC.criteria: Advanced cancer excluding cancer within the blood, adequate kidney and liver function. Prior use of vinflunine, other active medical disorders, severe nerve damage
